text: [Music]
hi everyone and welcome to today's video
session my name is thomas and i'm one of
the ielts teachers here at lango
learning system these online video
sessions are designed to help you
improve a certain facet of one of the
four key competences for your ielts exam
in this case speaking
in the ielts exam the speaker will
frequently ask the candidates questions
related to sport like what sports do you
play how often do you play sports or the
importance of sports to make sure you
can answer these questions more smoothly
are you ready for the lesson then let's
begin number one is active rest this
means a period of leisure time during
which you exercise for example yoga is
one of the best choices for my active
rest times i can learn mindfulness
breathing techniques and self-control
number two is to blow the competition
away this means to win a competition or
race by a large margin
for example after training for many
years my brother blew the competition
away in yesterday's swimming race number
three is personal best this is an
achievement in a sport that's better
than anything you've achieved before
for example i think some people enjoy
participating in sport because they're
perfectionists they're obsessed with
improving and smashing their previous
personal bests number four is strength
training strategy
this is a set of exercises to build
specific muscles for example after
spotting me struggling with the weights
in the gym the fitness coach designed a
detailed strength training strategy for
me
number five is strenuous exercise
exercise which needs a lot of physical
effort
those who aren't used to physical
activity should avoid strenuous exercise
like basketball or running they should
start with more moderate exercises such
as brisk walking or swimming number six
is to be out of condition
or to be out of shape this means to be
in bad physical condition or to lose
strength an example would be due to the
covered pandemic i have always had to
stay at home and being so plugged into
my smartphone makes me feel
out of condition number seven is to go
jogging the activity of running at a
slow regular speed especially as a form
of exercise
i usually go jogging for an hour before
breakfast that makes me feel healthy and
strong number eight is to set a record
to achieve the best result in a sport
for example some people enjoy
participating in sport because they want
to set a record for themselves
number nine is to build muscle to gain
muscle by working out
when i'm in the process of building
muscle i have to eat logically and
strategically i must stay away from fast
food like fried chicken pizza and
hamburgers which is a shame because they
are my favorite foods
number 10 is keep fit exercises
exercises that help you keep your body
in good shape
for example during the covid19 pandemic
gymnastic centers have been closed so
i'm stuck indoors a lot of the time i
have to do keep fit exercises to keep my
weight in check really hope that you've
found this session helpful in preparing
you for your ielts test
if you want to sign up for ielts courses
here at lango then please click on the
link below
our ielts courses are designed to cater
to your individual needs and to provide
individual learning pathways
please remember to like and subscribe
and please don't forget to hit that bell
button to get notifications of our
latest video uploads i've been thomas
from lango learning system and hopefully
i'll see you for the next session bye
